channel.title: Npc tele
channel.description:
1. How i make that u kill npc, it teles you to another place?
2. How i make that u klick on a chest u teled with an item? (you dont need an item to open the chest)
---------- 1. "How do I make it to where after I kill a specific Npc, I am teleported to the next area?"
2. "How do I make it to where if I click on a chest, it gives me an item and also teleports me to a certain area? (U dont need a key to open the chest)"
---And if u give me the code, where to put it?---

item.title: Npc tele

Oh I can try to figure out how ONCE I GET MY OWN GOD D*** SERVER!

item.title: Npc tele
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

[quote=“jarnohhh, post:1, topic:228123”]1. How i make that u kill npc, it teles you to another place?

  1. How i make that u klick on a chest u teled with an item? (you dont need an item to open the chest)

—And if u give me the code, where to put it?—[/quote]

Let me rephrase your question…

  1. “How do I make it to where after I kill a specific Npc, I am teleported to the next area?”

  2. “How do I make it to where if I click on a chest, it gives me an item and also teleports me to a certain area?”

“Also, if you figure this out, please give me the code.”

Read full topic
